#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
int main()
{
	ll i,n,num,max=0;
	cin>>n;
	map<string,int> m;
	string s,c;
	map<string,int>::iterator it;
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		cin>>s>>num;
		it = m.find(s);
	    if(it != m.end()) 
		{
		num+= it->second;
		m.erase(it);
	    }
	    m.insert(pair<string,int>(s,num));
	    if(num>max)
		{
		max=num;
		c=s;
	    }
	}
	    cout<<c<<endl;
	return 0;
}
